# FreeSaveVideo (cobalt_bam)

> FreeSaveVideo is a web-based media downloader and toolkit. It supports link parsing, downloadable media extraction, transfer, and FAQ/help pages in multiple languages.

## Canonical Site
- https://freesavevideo.online/

## Main Pages
- Home: https://freesavevideo.online/en
- Chinese Home: https://freesavevideo.online/zh
- FAQ: https://freesavevideo.online/en/faq
- Guide Index: https://freesavevideo.online/en/guide
- Discover: https://freesavevideo.online/en/discover

## Machine-Readable Discovery
- Sitemap: https://freesavevideo.online/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://freesavevideo.online/robots.txt

## API
- Base URL: https://api.freesavevideo.online/
- Health: https://api.freesavevideo.online/health
- API Docs: https://github.com/imputnet/cobalt/blob/main/docs/api.md

## Supported Languages
- de, en, es, fr, ja, ko, ru, th, vi, zh

## Notes
- Some media extraction capabilities depend on source platform limits and availability.
- Public pages should be indexed; private/admin pages are not intended for search indexing.
